definition: suffix of a noun of locality
not to the point/wide of the mark/neither here nor there/irrelevant
extremely vast/boundless/limitless/digressing/discursive/going off on tangents/straying far off topic

sentences.english: At the cost balance point on the institutional margin, the allocation of power achieves Pareto Optimality.
sentences.chinese: 在制度边际成本持平处权力的配置达到帕累托最优。

sentences.english: Revenue and Margin Driver Suppliers take actions that go much further than improving supply chain efficiencies, reactively or proactively.
sentences.chinese: 收入和边际利润驱动厂商对供应链的变革更进一步。

sentences.english: Diminishing marginal returns are like pickingapples.
sentences.chinese: 边际收益递减像摘苹果。

sentences.english: Studies have shown that the white pine and loblolly pine are 2 kinds of trees that grow well on marginal land.
sentences.chinese: 研究显示，白松和火炬松在边际土地上生长良好。

sentences.english: He felt sick of the broad words of his colleagues' flirting.
sentences.chinese: 他同事调情时那些漫无边际的话使他感到呕心。

sentences.english: The world is much larger than you can imagine right now.
sentences.chinese: 这个世界的深广远超你现在想象的边际。

sentences.english: Explain and evaluate J. B. Clark's marginal productivity theory of distribution.
sentences.chinese: 解释和评价克拉克的边际生产力分配理论。

sentences.english: That slope is the marginal propensity to consume.
sentences.chinese: 这个斜率就是边际消费倾向。

sentences.english: Sometime what he mutters sounds nothing and elusive.
sentences.chinese: 有时候他好像喃喃自语，内容空洞而不著边际。

sentences.english: Almost by definition, margins on products sold via the Internet are slim to razor-thin .
sentences.chinese: 按定义，通过因特网卖出的产品的边际利润非常薄。

sentences.english: The expectation that in these conditions profits will rebound strongly is quite far-fetched.
sentences.chinese: 对于利润率强劲反弹的期待是完全不着边际的。

sentences.english: Golson has discovered the descending law of boundary effect and the maximum law of hedonism.
sentences.chinese: 戈森发现了边际效用递减规律和享乐最大化定律。

sentences.english: The Defense Department is only marginally concerned with the effects of foreign competition on the machine-tool industry.
sentences.chinese: 国防部只考虑了国外竞争对电机产业的边际效用。

sentences.english: We are reaching out for a new and boundless frontier.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在正迈向一个没有边际的新境界。

sentences.english: My lover had been at the gates of death, and at the very brink of eternity .
sentences.chinese: 我的情人曾经走近死亡之门和永劫的边际。

sentences.english: Gossen discovered the laws of marginal utility progressive decrease and maximum enjoyment.
sentences.chinese: 戈森发现了边际效用递减规律和享乐最大化定律。

definition: to slow down/to ease up/to abate/slowdown/downturn
(of trains) up (i.e. towards the capital)/(of river boats) to go against the current/to submit (a document) to higher authorities
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
as far as the eye can see (idiom)
(of a tide) to ebb or go out
